skill.name: stop-slop
skill.description: Remove AI writing patterns from prose. Use when drafting, editing, or reviewing text to eliminate predictable AI tells.
skill.summary: Remove AI writing patterns from prose. Use when drafting, editing, or reviewing text to eliminate pr...
skill.author: Hardik Pandya (https://hvpandya.com)

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill containing writing guidelines and style rules. All static analysis findings are false positives - the 'external_commands' are markdown code blocks showing directory structure, 'hardcoded URLs' are documentation links, and 'weak cryptographic algorithm' references are examples of phrases to avoid in writing.

content.user_title: Remove AI writing patterns from text
content.value_statement: AI writing contains predictable patterns that make content sound robotic. This skill helps identify and eliminate these patterns to create more natural, human-sounding prose.
actual_capabilities: Identifies common AI writing phrases and patterns
Scores text on directness, rhythm, trust, authenticity, and density
Includes comprehensive phrase and structure reference guides
limitations: Cannot detect all possible AI patterns

use_cases.title: Polish AI-generated drafts
use_cases.description: Remove robotic patterns from AI-written content to make it sound more natural and human.

use_cases.title: Identify AI writing tells
use_cases.description: Spot common AI patterns in submissions and provide writers with specific improvement guidance.

use_cases.title: Improve essay writing
use_cases.description: Eliminate formulaic patterns and develop a more authentic writing voice for academic work.

prompt_templates.title: Basic editing
prompt_templates.scenario: Review a paragraph for AI patterns
prompt_templates.prompt: Check this text for AI writing patterns and suggest improvements: [paste text]

prompt_templates.title: Score content
prompt_templates.prompt: Score this text from 1-10 on directness, rhythm, trust, authenticity, and density: [paste text]

prompt_templates.title: Rewrite section
prompt_templates.prompt: Rewrite this section to eliminate AI patterns while preserving the meaning: [paste text]

prompt_templates.title: Full article review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this article for AI writing patterns, score each section, and provide specific revision recommendations

output_examples.input: The truth is, AI writing often contains predictable patterns. Here's the thing: once you notice these tells, you see them everywhere. Make no mistake - this impacts reader trust.
output: Once noticed, these tells appear everywhere

best_practices: Always review suggestions in context - some patterns may serve a purpose
Focus on clarity over strict rule adherence
Vary sentence structure naturally rather than mechanically
Trust your ear - if it sounds robotic, revise it
anti_patterns: Applying all rules blindly without considering context
Forcing unnatural phrasing just to avoid patterns
Assuming all AI-detected text needs complete rewriting
Ignoring the overall flow while fixing individual sentences

faq.question: Will this make my writing perfect?
faq.answer: No tool can guarantee perfect writing. This skill helps identify common patterns but requires your judgment.

faq.question: Can it detect GPT-specific patterns?
faq.answer: It identifies general AI writing patterns that appear across different models, not GPT-specific tells.

faq.question: Should I remove every flagged phrase?
faq.answer: No. Consider context and intent. Sometimes these phrases serve a legitimate purpose.

faq.question: Does it work with creative writing?
faq.answer: Yes, though creative writing may intentionally use some patterns for effect. Use discretion.

faq.question: Can it help with non-English text?
faq.answer: The patterns are English-specific. Other languages have different AI writing tells.

faq.question: How do I know if text needs revision?
faq.answer: Score below 35/50 suggests revision needed. Also trust your reading experience.
